member.name: WS_XML_STRING
member.summary: Represents a string that optionally has information associated with it. The xml APIs use WS_XML_STRINGs to identify prefixes, localNames and namespaces.

member.name: WS_XML_STRING.length
member.summary: The number of bytes in the UTF-8 encoded representation of the string.

member.name: WS_XML_STRING.bytes
member.summary: The string encoded as UTF-8 bytes.

member.name: WS_XML_STRING.dictionary
member.summary: A pointer to the dictionary that contains the string. If the string is not part of a dictionary then the value may be NULL.

summary.para: A value that uniquely identifies the string within the specified dictionary. The entry at dictionary->strings[id] should identify this string.
If the dictionary is NULL, then this value is unused.
